title: Alex Hall Talks ‘Selling the OC’ Season 1 | It Was All a Stream
description:
Juliet Litman it joined by Alex Hall, star of Netflix’s ‘Selling the OC’. Hall discusses how Season 1 came together, what was left out, how her life has changed since the show came out, and much more.
Host: Juliet Litman
Guest: Alex Hall
Producer: Sasha Ashall
Additional Production: Chelsea Stark-Jones
